main event: A UFO sighting reported on 19 September 1954 involving a silver object moving very slowly at Beaumont, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 30-40,000 feet,The sighting had no radar pick-up,The object was concluded to be probably a balloon,Another report from 6 September 1954 described a bright object traveling very slowly,The sightings were part of Project Blue Book's investigation.
